|brand = Hawking |model = UH104 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = G |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/15/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Hawking UH104 rev G |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 1.1 |conn = Male A |size_class = mini
|vendor_id = 05e3 |device_id = 0604 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Genesys Logic;GL650USB; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = |pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC or POE --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|is_manuf = No |manuf = Good Way |manuf_model = UH-244 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 2004 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 603992502844 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000065944 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular revision is not black - it is the standard '''Hawking''' blueish-gray used in the old days..
"UH244\244A VER:2.2" is silkscreened on the component side of the board. :The casing looks the same as the [http://www.amazon.co.uk/Videk-Mini-Desktop-Hub-UH244/dp/tech-data/B000641SD8 '''Videk''' Mini Desktop Hub UH244]. The parent OEM product would seem to be the [http://web.archive.org/web/20040104080844/http://www.goodway.com.tw/en/product3.asp?listid=3&id=4&subid=7&pid=68&typeid=7 '''Good Way''' UH-244] ([http://web.archive.org/web/20041028194429/http://www.goodway.com.tw/en/prodimg/manual/UH232-244.pdf pdf]).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
